about.title: About UniTools
about.intro: UniTools is a comprehensive online utility platform offering 200+ browser-based tools for everyday digital tasks. Our mission is to provide fast, secure, and free tools that respect your privacy.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: To consolidate all essential digital tools into one platform, eliminating the need to visit multiple websites for simple tasks.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.desc: All file processing happens directly in your browser. Your files never leave your device and are never uploaded to our servers.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.desc: Client-side processing means instant results with no upload or download wait times.

global.title: Global Access
global.desc: Available worldwide with multi-language support and optimized for users from any country.

whyUs.title: Why Choose UniTools?
whyUs.item1: 100% Free - No hidden costs, subscriptions, or premium features
whyUs.item2: No Registration Required - Use any tool instantly without creating an account
whyUs.item3: Privacy Guaranteed - Files are processed locally and never stored on servers
whyUs.item4: Works Offline - Many tools work even without internet connection

tools.title: 200+ Tools at Your Fingertips
tools.desc: From PDF manipulation to image editing, video conversion to developer utilities, calculators to fun generators - UniTools has everything you need in one place.

highlight.title: Your Privacy is Our Priority
highlight.desc: All file processing occurs entirely within your browser using client-side technology. Your files, data, and personal information are NEVER uploaded to or stored on our servers.

noServer.title: 100% Client-Side Processing
noServer.desc: UniTools uses WebAssembly and browser-based technologies to process all files locally on your device. This means:
noServer.item1: Your files never leave your computer or mobile device
noServer.item2: No data is transmitted to our servers during file processing
noServer.item3: Your work remains completely private and secure

dataCollection.title: What We Collect
dataCollection.desc: We collect minimal data necessary to improve our service and understand usage patterns.

analytics.title: Analytics Data
analytics.desc: We use privacy-respecting analytics to understand which tools are most popular and how users navigate our site. This data is anonymous and cannot be traced back to individual users.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.desc: We use essential cookies to remember your language preference and theme settings. These cookies do not track your identity or browsing behavior.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.desc: We display advertisements through Google AdSense to keep our service free. Google may use cookies to serve personalized ads based on your browsing history. You can opt out of personalized advertising through Google's Ad Settings.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.desc: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us through our Contact page.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.desc: By accessing and using UniTools, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: Service Description
description.desc: UniTools provides free online tools for file conversion, editing, and various utility functions. All processing is performed client-side in your browser.

use.title: Acceptable Use
use.desc: You agree to use UniTools only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You agree NOT to:
use.item1: Use our service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
use.item2: Attempt to probe, scan, or test the vulnerability of our systems
use.item3: Interfere with or disrupt our service or servers
use.item4: Use automated systems to access our service without permission

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.desc: The UniTools name, logo, and all content on this website are protected by copyright and trademark laws. You may not use our branding without express written permission.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.desc: UniTools is provided 'as is' without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee that our service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of harmful components.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.desc: UniTools shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use our service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.desc: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of UniTools after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.desc: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable international laws and regulations.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions, suggestions, or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!

success.title: Message Sent!
success.desc: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

jpg-to-pdf.description: 複数のJPG画像を1つのPDFファイルに結合します。

merge-pdf.description: 複数のPDFファイルを1つに結合します。

split-pdf.description: PDFファイルを複数のファイルに分割します。

compress-pdf.description: 共有しやすいようにPDFファイルサイズを縮小します。

png-to-jpg.description: PNG画像をJPG形式に変換します。

jpg-to-png.description: JPG画像をPNG形式に変換します。

webp-to-jpg.description: WebP画像をJPG形式に変換します。

resize-image.description: 画像の幅と高さを任意のサイズに調整します。

crop-image.description: 画像から希望のエリアを切り取ります。
crop-image.shortDesc: 画像エリアを切り抜き

compress-image.title: 画像を圧縮
compress-image.description: Web最適化のために画像ファイルサイズを縮小します。

convert-image.title: 画像形式変換
convert-image.description: 画像を異なる形式（JPG、PNG、WebP）に変換します。

video-to-gif.title: 動画からGIF
video-to-gif.description: 動画ファイルをアニメーションGIFに変換します。

heic-to-jpg.title: HEICからJPG
heic-to-jpg.description: iPhoneのHEIC写真をJPG形式に変換します。

webp-converter.title: WebPコンバーター
webp-converter.description: 画像をGoogleのWebP形式に変換します。

svg-to-png.title: SVGからPNG
svg-to-png.description: ベクターSVGグラフィックをPNG画像に変換します。

bulk-convert-image.description: 複数の画像を一度に異なる形式に変換します。

webp-to-png.title: WebPからPNG
webp-to-png.description: WebP画像をPNG形式に変換します。

gif-to-png.description: GIFの最初のフレームをPNG画像として抽出します。

rotate-image.title: 画像を回転
rotate-image.description: 画像を90、180、または270度回転します。

flip-image.title: 画像を反転
flip-image.description: 画像を水平または垂直に反転します。

image-upscaler.title: 画像アップスケーラー
image-upscaler.description: AIを使用して低解像度画像を強化およびアップスケールします。

canvas-size.title: キャンバスサイズ変更
canvas-size.description: 画像の周りのキャンバスエリアを拡張します。

remove-background.title: 背景を削除
remove-background.description: ワンクリックで写真から背景を自動的に削除します。

image-mosaic.description: 画像の特定のエリアをぼかしまたはピクセル化します。

image-watermark.description: 画像を保護するためにテキストまたは画像の透かしを追加します。

text-shuffle.title: Text Shuffler
text-shuffle.description: Randomly shuffle the order of lines or words.
text-shuffle.instructions: Enter lines of text to shuffle randomly.

binary-converter.title: バイナリ変換
binary-converter.description: テキストをバイナリに変換します。

morse-code.title: モールス符号
morse-code.description: テキストをモールス符号に変換します。

json-formatter.description: JSONデータをフォーマットして整形します。

base64-encode.title: Base64 Encoder
base64-encode.description: Encode text or files to Base64.

unit-converter.title: 単位変換
unit-converter.description: 異なる測定単位間で変換します。

liar-game.rule1: One player is randomly selected as the liar.
liar-game.rule2: Each player checks the word in turn. The liar sees "You are the liar".
liar-game.rule3: Take turns describing the word. The liar must pretend to know it.
liar-game.rule4: After discussion, vote to find the liar.
liar-game.rule5: If the liar is found, citizens win. Otherwise, the liar wins!
liar-game.tip1: Being too specific gives the liar hints.
liar-game.tip2: Being too vague makes you look suspicious.
liar-game.tip3: As liar, listen carefully to others and blend in.
liar-game.liarHint: You don't know the word. Act natural!
